abilities.name: Get Da Good Bitz
abilities.description: Objective markers you control remain under your control, even if you have no models within range of them, until your opponent controls them at the start or end of any turn.

abilities.name: Cowardly
abilities.description: After this unit takes a Battle-shock test, if it fails, all models in this unit must take the maximum possible move toward the closest battlefield edge.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Boyz unit.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Waaagh! Energy
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model's 'Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down). While that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon also has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

abilities.name: Da Jump (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase, one Weirdboy from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that Weirdboy's unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2+, remove this Weirdboy's unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Boyz or Nobz.

abilities.name: Might Is Right
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Da Biggest and da Best
abilities.description: While a Waaagh! is active for your army, add 4 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model.

abilities.name: Da Boss' Ladz
abilities.description: While this unit is being led by a WARBOSS model, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack exceeds this unit's Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Krumpin' Time
abilities.description: While a Waaagh! is active for your army, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

abilities.name: Loot It
abilities.description: Each time this unit destroys an enemy VEHICLE unit, you gain a number of extra Command points equal to the number of models in this unit (to a maximum of 3 CP). Each time this unit destroys any other enemy unit, you gain 1 Command point.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Boyz or Lootas.

abilities.name: Kustom Force Field
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Mekaniak
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, this model can repair one friendly ORKS VEHICLE model within 3". That model regains up to D3 lost wounds (roll before any other repairs take place).

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Boyz, Nobz, or Beast Snagga Boyz.

abilities.name: Sawbonez
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

abilities.name: Infiltrators
abilities.description: During deployment, this unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

abilities.name: Throat Slittas
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if this unit was set up on the battlefield using the Infiltrators ability this battle, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves, and when doing so, can be set up in the skies instead of being set up on the battlefield. If it is, at the end of the Reinforcements step of one of your Movement phases, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Full Throttle
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Pyromaniaks
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack with a burna, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Monster Hunterz
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Tank Hunters
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Bomb Squigs
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can launch a Bomb Squig. If it does, one model in that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves, and when doing so, can be set up in the skies instead of being set up on the battlefield. If it is, at the end of the Reinforcements step of one of your Movement phases, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Skyboyz
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Drive-by Dakka
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Cowardly Grots
abilities.description: While this unit is within 6" of a friendly ORKS INFANTRY unit that contains 10 or more models, this unit is not Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Dread Mob
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if it made a Charge move this turn, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK models.

abilities.name: Ramshackle
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack (minimum 1). In addition, each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [LANCE] ability.

abilities.name: Squig Charge
abilities.description: Each time this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Meganobz.

abilities.name: Da Biggest Boss
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: 'Ere We Go, 'Ere We Go!
abilities.description: While a Waaagh! is active for your army, this model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Beast Snagga Boyz.

abilities.name: Beastboss
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Squigosaur Charge
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Brute Strength
abilities.description: Once per battle, this model can use this ability at the start of the Fight phase. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [LETHAL HITS] ability and each time this model makes a melee attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -4.

abilities.name: Smasha Squig Charge
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it. Roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Gun-crazy Show-offs
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Ammo Runts
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Squig Mine
abilities.description: Once per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE units) it moved over during that move and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Drill Through
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Billowing Fumes
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack targets this unit, if this unit Advanced this turn, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Shokk Tunnel
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, this model can use its shokk tunnel. If it does, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Grot Gunner
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll when resolving those attacks.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 20 ORKS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK models. At the start of the Charge phase, if this model is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can select any number of units embarked within this Transport. Each selected unit can disembark this turn, but if it does, it cannot declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: 'Ard Case
abilities.description: Once per turn, when this TRANSPORT is selected as the target of a ranged attack, after that attack has been resolved, if this model was destroyed, you can select one friendly INFANTRY unit that was embarked within it at the start of that attack. That unit is not removed from the battlefield - instead, set it up within 3" of this TRANSPORT before it is removed.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Walker
abilities.description: This model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK models.

abilities.name: Gork's Rampage
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Walker
abilities.description: This model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK models.

abilities.name: Kustom Force Field
abilities.description: While a friendly ORKS unit is within 6" of this model, that unit has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 6+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 6+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 10 BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY models.

abilities.name: Spirit of Gork
abilities.description: Once per battle round, after this model ends a Charge move, you can select one enemy unit within 9" of this model and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Wurrboy Powers (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one of the following to take effect until the start of your next Shooting phase: friendly BEAST SNAGGA units within 6" get +1 to hit in melee; or one enemy unit within 18" takes D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 6+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 6+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 10 BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY models.

abilities.name: Harpoon Tow
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack with its harpoon launcher that destroys a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, until the end of the battle, this model's harpoon launcher can target that unit even if it is not visible.

abilities.name: Artillery
abilities.description: This unit cannot move during the Movement phase. Each time this unit is selected to shoot, it can only make attacks with its equipped gun.

rules.name: Get Stuck In
rules.description: Each time an ORKS model from your army makes a melee attack, if it made a Charge move this turn, or it was charged this turn, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack. In addition, melee weapons equipped by ORKS models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

stratagems.name: Unbridled Carnage
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase. Select one ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ instead of only a 6.

stratagems.name: Orks Is Never Beaten
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. Select one ORKS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: 'Ere We Go
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of your Movement phase. Select one ORKS INFANTRY unit from your army. Until the end of the turn, add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

stratagems.name: 'Ard as Nails
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. Select one ORKS unit from your army (excluding GROTS, MONSTER, and VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Mob Rule
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of any phase. Select one MOB unit from your army that has 10+ models and is not Below Half-strength. Until the end of the phase, while a friendly ORKS INFANTRY unit (excluding GROTS units) is within 6" of that MOB unit, that INFANTRY unit is treated as if it were not Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Careen!
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in any phase, just after an ORKS VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed. Do not roll to see if that model's Deadly Demise ability inflicts any mortal wounds. Instead, before removing that model from play, you can select one enemy unit within 6" of it and roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers mortal wounds equal to the Deadly Demise value of the destroyed model.

enhancements.name: Follow Me Ladz
enhancements.description: ORKS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

enhancements.name: Headwoppa's Killchoppa
enhancements.description: ORKS model only. Melee weapons equipped by the bearer have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

enhancements.name: Kunnin' But Brutal
enhancements.description: ORKS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

enhancements.name: Supa-Cybork Body
enhancements.description: ORKS model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

waaagh.name: Waaagh!
waaagh.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase, you can call a Waaagh!. If you do, until the start of your next Command phase, ORKS units from your army get +1 to Strength, +1 to Attacks (melee only), and +1 to Charge rolls. A Waaagh! can only be called if your WARLORD is an ORKS model and is on the battlefield.

weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic, and the attack sequence ends.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits: Critical hits generate additional hits (number specified after the ability name).
weaponKeywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at -1 to hit).
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, but only at units within Engagement Range.
weaponKeywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire: Double the Attacks characteristic when targeting within half range.
weaponKeywords.Heavy: +1 to hit if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.
weaponKeywords.Anti-: Improves wound roll against targets with the specified keyword (e.g., Anti-Vehicle 4+ wounds on 4+ vs Vehicles).
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll one D6. On a 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds.
weaponKeywords.Dakka: Each time this weapon targets a unit within half range, the Attacks characteristic is increased by the number shown in brackets. For example, Dakka [2] would add 2 Attacks at half range.

weapon.name: Anti-X #+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on #+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 Attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage, no saves allowed.

weapon.name: Dakka
weapon.description: Increases Attacks when targeting within half range.

weapon.name: Extra Attacks
weapon.description: This weapon's attacks are made in addition to other weapons.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: Roll D6 after attacking; on 1, bearer takes 3 mortal wounds.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to hit if target not visible, and target gets benefit of cover.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: +1 to wound if bearer made a Charge move this turn.

weapon.name: One Shot
weapon.description: This weapon can only be shot once per battle.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On a Critical Hit, can allocate wound to a visible CHARACTER model.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits generate X extra hits.

unit.name: Artillery
unit.description: Heavy weapons platforms, often crewed by Grots. May have movement restrictions.

unit.name: Orks
unit.description: Units from the Orks faction. Benefit from Waaagh! army rule.

unit.name: Beast Snagga
unit.description: Orks who have dedicated themselves to hunting the galaxy's most dangerous beasts. Gain bonuses against Monsters and Vehicles.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: Can lead units, receive Enhancements, and is targeted by Precision.

unit.name: Deadly Demise X
unit.description: When destroyed, roll D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers X mortal wounds.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemies.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Roll D6 when losing a wound. On X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Fly
unit.description: Can move over models and terrain. May have special interactions with other abilities.

unit.name: Gretchin
unit.description: Small, cowardly greenskins used as cannon fodder and workers by the Orks.

unit.name: Infiltrators
unit.description: Can deploy anywhere more than 9" from enemy deployment zone and models.

unit.name: Jump Pack
unit.description: Infantry with jet propulsion, allowing Deep Strike and increased mobility.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to Bodyguard units. Abilities affect the combined unit.

unit.name: Mega Armour
unit.description: Heavy armoured suits worn by Meganobz. Provides excellent protection but reduces mobility.

unit.name: Mob
unit.description: Large groups of Orks fighting together. Often benefit from abilities that scale with model count.

unit.name: Monster
unit.description: Large creatures with high Toughness and Wounds. Cannot use terrain for cover.

unit.name: Mounted
unit.description: Units riding vehicles, bikes, or beasts. Often have increased mobility and toughness.

unit.name: Psyker
unit.description: Can use Psychic abilities. Ork Weirdboyz channel the Waaagh! energy of nearby Orks.

unit.name: Titanic
unit.description: Massive war machines. Can shoot and charge after Falling Back. Can move over non-Titanic models.

unit.name: Transport
unit.description: Can carry infantry models. Check unit profile for capacity and restrictions.

unit.name: Vehicle
unit.description: Armored vehicles with higher toughness. Cannot use terrain for cover, may Fall Back and shoot.

unit.name: Walker
unit.description: Bipedal war machines piloted by Grots or Orks. Combine shooting and melee prowess.
